articles.author: Pieter Haeck
articles.title: Dutch government seizes control of Chinese-owned chipmaker Nexperia - politico.eu
articles.description: The move could inflame wider trade tensions between Beijing and the European Union.
articles.content: Nexperia is headquartered in Nijmegen, in the northeast of the Netherlands, and has been controlled by Wingtech since 2019. Recently there have been signals of serious administrative shortcomings at … [+1126 chars]
